title: About
text: My work integrates functional, spatial, and evolutionary ecology to explore tropical biodiversity.

title: About
text: My work integrates functional, spatial, and evolutionary ecology to explore tropical biodiversity.

title: Vitor de Andrade Kamimura
text:
Profile photo




Hi, I‚Äôm Vitor üëã
I am a plant ecologist fascinated by the diversity of tropical ecosystems and by life‚Äôs capacity to persist in extreme environments. My research integrates evolutionary, functional, and spatial ecology to uncover the mechanisms that generate, maintain, and organize biodiversity, and to understand how ecological and evolutionary processes interact across scales in space and time.
In my work, I integrate:

field sampling and experiments
long term studies
laboratory experiments and trait measurements
statistical analysis and modelling in R
